channel.title: CVE Feed for india-web-developer -- SEO Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for india-web-developer -- SEO Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-9521|2024-10-16T02:04:59.979Z -- india-web-developer -- seo%20manager
item.description: The SEO Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via post meta in versions up to, and including, 1.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
